com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Class AfterOpenOperationResult.NotificationsHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.AfterOpenOperationResult.NotificationsHolder
  • Enclosing class:
    AfterOpenOperationResult

    public static class AfterOpenOperationResult.NotificationsHolder
extends Object
    A bean that holds all notifications (object's and column's) for exact BDDObject

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessage(Message message)
      Adds notification message for an object
      Collection<AfterOpenOperationResult.NotificationsHolder> getChildrenNotifications()
      Returns notifications of the child that were collected by user exit
      Map<String,Message> getColumnMessages()
      Returns [ColumnUUID -> Notification message] map
      List<Message> getObjectMessages()
      Returns object notifications
      String getObjectName()
      Returns name of the object this holder has notifications for
      String getRowId()
      Returns row id of the object this holder has notifications for
      String getTableName()
      Returns table name of the object this holder has notifications for
      void setColumnMessage(String columnUUID, Message message)
      Set notification message for a column of an object Note: columnUUID parameter should match to one of BDDObject.getColumns()

        public void setColumnMessage(String columnUUID,
                             Message message)
        Set notification message for a column of an object Note: columnUUID parameter should match to one of BDDObject.getColumns()

        columnUUID - columnUUID of the column that should have notification
        message - message to be shown near column
